Posts.Content: That's a brilliant idea having a set time to freak out. I have Google way too much but have now reached the quesera sera stage.
Posts.Title: New, just been referred for fast track tests after finding lump

Posts.Content: Hi Windmill. I totally understand your fears. Like everyone on here will tell you it is the waiting between appointments that's the worst. No matter what anyone says you'll be on a roller-coaster of emotions. I know I was. I am still waiting to know all my results. Atleast in England things seem to move a bit quicker. Myself and many more are here if you need to chat.
Posts.Title: New, just been referred for fast track tests after finding lump
